SGModel.isDistributed.description: Check if distributed game mode is enabled.

SGModel.getConnectedInstancesCount.description: Get the number of connected instances in distributed game mode.

SGModel.getGrid_withOwner.description: Get the first grid that belongs to a specific owner

SGModel.getGrids.description: Get all grids (gameSpaces that are SGGrid instances)

SGModel.getGrids_withOwner.description: Get all grids that belong to a specific owner

SGModel.displayTimeInWindowTitle.description: Set whether to display the time (Round number and Phase number) in the window title.

SGPlayer.addGameAction.description: Add a action to the Player

SGPlayer.newActivateAction.description: Create a new ActivateAction and automatically add it to this player.

SGPlayer.newCreateAction.description: Create a new CreateAction and automatically add it to this player.

SGPlayer.newDeleteAction.description: Create a new DeleteAction and automatically add it to this player.

SGPlayer.newFlipAction.description: Create a new FlipAction and automatically add it to this player.

SGPlayer.newModifyAction.description: Create a new ModifyAction and automatically add it to this player.

SGPlayer.newModifyActionWithDialog.description: Create a new ModifyActionWithDialog and automatically add it to this player.

SGPlayer.newMoveAction.description: Create a new MoveAction and automatically add it to this player.

SGPlayer.getValue.description: Return the value of a cell Attribut

SGPlayer.calcValue.description: Apply a calculation on the value of an attribut using a lambda function

SGPlayer.copyValue.description: Copy the value of an attribut (source_att), in another attribute (target_att)

SGPlayer.decValue.description: Decrease the value of an attribut with an additional value

SGPlayer.incValue.description: Increase the value of an attribut with an additional value

SGPlayer.setValue.description: Sets the value of an attribut

SGPlayer.setValue_randomChoice.description: Set a random value for an attribute from a list of choices.

SGPlayer.setValues.description: Set multiple attribute values at once.

SGPlayer.isNotValue.description: Tests if the the value of an attribut is not equal to a value

SGPlayer.isValue.description: Tests if the the value of an attribut if equal to a value

SGProgressGauge.setBackgroundColor.description: Set the background color of the progress gauge.

SGProgressGauge.setBorderColor.description: Set the border color of the progress gauge.

SGProgressGauge.setBorderSize.description: Set the border size of the progress gauge.

SGProgressGauge.applyContainerAspectStyl.description: Avoid QSS cascade; rely on paintEvent for container rendering.

SGProgressGauge.onTextAspectsChanged.description: Apply title and text aspects (color, font, size, weight, style, decoration, alignment).

SGStack.bottomTile.description: Get the tile with the lowest layer (bottom of the stack)

SGStack.getLastSlotsFilled.description: Get the number of slots that were filled during the last call to refillAvailableSlots().

SGStack.getTilesWithFace.description: Get all tiles in the stack that have a specific face

SGStack.getTilesWithValue.description: Get all tiles in the stack that have a specific attribute value

SGStack.maxLayer.description: Get the maximum layer in the stack

SGStack.minLayer.description: Get the minimum layer in the stack

SGStack.size.description: Get the number of tiles in the stack

SGStack.tileAtLayer.description: Get the tile at a specific layer

SGStack.topTile.description: Get the tile with the highest layer (top of the stack)

SGStack.contains.description: Check if a specific tile is in the stack

SGStack.isEmpty.description: Check if the stack is empty

SGStack.refillAvailableSlots.description: Refill available slots using the Open Drafting configuration.

SGStack.setTileAtLayer.description: Position a tile at a specific layer in the stack.

SGStack.shuffle.description: Shuffle the tiles in the stack and reassign layers from 1 to N

SGStack.setOpenDrafting.description: Configure Open Drafting mechanics for this stack.

SGTextBox.setBorderColor.description: Set the border color of the text box.

SGTextBox.setBorderSize.description: Set the border size of the text box.

SGTextBox.setHeight.description: Set custom height for the text box.

SGTextBox.setSize.description: Set custom width and height for the text box.

SGTextBox.setText.description: Replace the text by a new text.

SGTextBox.setTextFormat.description: Customize the font and the size of the text.

SGTextBox.setTitle.description: Replace the title by a new title.

SGTextBox.setTitleColor.description: Set the color of the title.

SGTextBox.setTitleFormat.description: Customize the font and the size of the title.

SGTextBox.setTitleSize.description: Set the size of the title.

SGTextBox.setWidth.description: Set custom width for the text box.

SGTextBox.addText.description: Add text to the text box.

SGTile.calcValue.description: Apply a calculation on the value of an attribut using a lambda function

SGTile.copyValue.description: Copy the value of an attribut (source_att), in another attribute (target_att)

SGTile.decValue.description: Decrease the value of an attribut with an additional value

SGTile.incValue.description: Increase the value of an attribut with an additional value

SGTile.setFace.description: Set the visible face of this tile.

SGTile.setLayer.description: Set the layer (z-index) of this tile and update z-order rendering.

SGTile.setValue.description: Sets the value of an attribut

SGTile.setValue_randomChoice.description: Set a random value for an attribute from a list of choices.

SGTile.setValues.description: Set multiple attribute values at once.

SGTile.delete.description: Delete this tile from the game.

SGTile.getAgentsHere.description: Get all agents on the cell where this tile is placed.

SGTile.getCell.description: Get the cell where this tile is placed.

SGTile.getCoords.description: Get the grid coordinates of the cell where this tile is placed.

SGTile.getFace.description: Get the currently visible face of this tile.

SGTile.getGrid.description: Get the grid associated with this entity.

SGTile.getLayer.description: Get the layer (z-index) of this tile in its stack.

SGTile.getValue.description: Return the value of a cell Attribut

SGTile.isFaceBack.description: Check if the back face is currently visible.

SGTile.isFaceFront.description: Check if the front face is currently visible.

SGTile.isNotValue.description: Tests if the the value of an attribut is not equal to a value

SGTile.isOccupied.description: Check if the cell containing this tile is occupied by any agents.

SGTile.isValue.description: Tests if the the value of an attribut if equal to a value

SGTile.flip.description: Flip the tile to show the other face.

SGTile.moveTo.description: Move this tile to a specific cell.

SGTile.placeOn.description: Place the tile on a cell (alias for moveTo).

SGTimeLabel.setDisplayPhaseName.description: Set whether to display the phase name.

SGTimeLabel.setDisplayPhaseNumber.description: Set whether to display the phase number.

SGTimeLabel.setDisplayRoundNumber.description: Set whether to display the round number.

SGTimeLabel.setDisplayTitle.description: Set whether to display the title.

SGTimeLabel.setLabelStyle.description: Set the style of all labels.

SGTimeLabel.setPhaseNameFormat.description: Set the format template for the phase name label.

SGTimeLabel.setPhaseNumberFormat.description: Set the format template for the phase number label.

SGTimeLabel.setRoundNumberFormat.description: Set the format template for the round number label.

SGTimeLabel.setTitleText.description: Set the title text of the time label.

SGTimePhase.setAutoForward.description: Active ou dsactive le passage automatique  la phase suivante

SGUserSelector.setCheckboxStyle.description: Set the style of all checkboxes.

SGUserSelector.setOrientation.description: Set the orientation of the user selector.

SGUserSelector.setTitleText.description: Set the title text of the user selector.
